channel.title: Need help; error connection to server
channel.description: [shadow=red,left]I need help!!![/shadow] :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: I have done all the steps, including setting PATH and CLASSPATH. I made myself the owner, and I changed everything that said "TestScape" to the name I desired for my server. I also changed TestScape's server source to the source I wanted (and hosted). I downloaded the most recent Java. Now, when i log onto the server, i get the message "Error connecting to server. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own." :eek:[shadow=red,left]Help![/shadow]:eek: [center] :mad: :mad: :mad:[/center]

item.title: Need help; error connection to server
item.dc:creator: @ar959 ar959
item.description:
@ar959 wrote:

Just leave the Ip Adress Empty when logging on or type 127.0.0.1…
And have u port forwarded?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help; error connection to server

item.title: Need help; error connection to server
item.dc:creator: @What_The1 What The?
item.description:
@What_The1 wrote:

[shadow=red,left]I need help!!![/shadow]

I have done all the steps, including setting PATH and CLASSPATH. I made myself the owner, and I changed everything that said “TestScape” to the name I desired for my server. I also changed TestScape’s server source to the source I wanted (and hosted). I downloaded the most recent Java. Now, when i log onto the server, i get the message “Error connecting to server. Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own.”
:eek:[shadow=red,left]Help![/shadow]:eek:
[center] :mad: :mad: :mad:[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help; error connection to server
